title: A Video on What objectives you Prioritize in your ranked game.
body:
Hey guys this is another video I made on objective Priority,
Tell me what you think and share if you liked it.
Enjoy

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JkFzrTDNbOU

replies.body:
Towers are higher than baron, lol

Not to mention, if i can get a 5th dragon i would prioritize that higher.

Fact is your using too brief a list to actually do the importance of each objective.

Honestly i stopped watching before 2 minutes because this isn't really all that good of a reference if that is how your going to open it up.

First up, Rift Herald is under prioritized as fuck, if your a jungler and can give that to a top laner, that enables easy towers, same with baron, but that is global.

Second, you can't prioritize dragon as one stock standard thing, because not only does it's priority change game to game (are you trying to go to a late game 5 dragons win condition, or a short slog where only the second one (the tower burn) will be useful?) but buff to buff that it gives.

Third, towers can't be prioritized as stock standard either, because generally speaking it depends on the tower, eg Rift Herald is worth more than a first tier tower, but not more than a Inhib tower. (that and it's arguable which is worth more between Inhib towers and inhibs in any given game.)

The video was supposed to be very generalized with a simple to understand list and brief pointers. Which took 18 min to do sorta, So imagine highlighting every aspect in every scenario, it would be very lengthy hence why I gave time stamps so people could skip to points they wanted to know about. 

I know there is a lot of things I could talk about but keep in mind this video is directed towards the majority of league community and its best to keep things simple. 

It is good to know that you have some what  more understanding and knowledge base than the average players but keep in mind the majority of the players do not and nor do they have they skill to execute it and over time they will gain those skills but you have to start somewhere therefore the video was made for their benefit.

Apologies if my content isn't the best but than again you only watched 2 minutes of it so you probably wouldn't have heard all the content. But this is a guideline for them to work off to improve and I would not want to cause them confusion.
